start: I heard there’s a psychopath that lives in the vaults.
Yeah, he wears this bloody sock puppet on one arm and a chainsaw on the other!
That’s nonsense. We’ve just had some...unfortunate accidents, yes that’s all.
And what if we have an accident?
You’re security! You guys are like redshirts, you’re paid to die!
These guys are new. I guess someone was bound to notice all the mysterious deaths.
Oh look, the new guys have guns. Won’t that be fun!
end: Y'know, I wonder how these people's families are going to feel about their deaths...
